overview:
Stacie Heiden joined DMS as CFO in 2006. She develops plans and forecasts based on broad corporate goals and growth objectives, creates the structure and processes necessary to manage the organization’s activities, and analyzes strategic and operational initiatives to determine financial impact to the organization. Prior to joining DMS, Stacie had extensive experience in healthcare finance including serving as CFO at Innovis Health in Fargo, where she was responsible for all financial functions of the hospital. She also served as Operations Finance Director of community operations at Banner Health System and was responsible for fiscal operations for Banner’s hospitals, clinics, nursing homes, home health agencies and diagnostic medical equipment.

Stacie received her Bachelor of Science in Accounting from North Dakota State University, Fargo. She is a Certified Public Accountant and a fellow of the American College of Healthcare Executives (ACHE).
